name: reconquest
description: Reconquest is a real-time strategy base building game. After World War III, mankind got close to extinction. You have to reconquer Earth by making better strategic decisions than your opponents.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32-bit Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3-3250 / AMD Phenom II X4 B70 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 7790 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
